title: "DCMS body flags need for artificial-intelligence work to be audited"
excerpt: "The roadmap document, which aimed to outline what will be required to develop an AI assurance industry, said that third-party auditors could assess, test and verify work by a software developer then provide independent information on its trustworthiness to users."
